name: LAB_REDRAW_INFO
description: The LAB_REDRAW_INFO table contains information on specimen redraws for an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAB_REDRAW_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The specimen redraw reason category number for a specimen attached to this order.  This explains why a specimen needed to be redrawn.

columns.name: LAB_REDRAW_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the request for specimen redraw was placed.

columns.name: LAB_REDRAW_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who requested the specimen redraw.

columns.name: LAB_REDRAW_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LAB_REDRAW_PREV_SPE
columns.description: The external identifier of the specimen on which the redraw was requested.
